author: ANI
title: Padmashri Anuradha Paudwal bringing Sanatan Dharma closer to the WORLD | Business
text: Padmashri Anuradha Paudwal bringing Sanatan Dharma closer to the WORLD A multicultural evening was celebrated in the House of Commons at the British Parliament, United Kingdom with the release of "The Works of Adi Shankaracharya", a music series of the scriptures by the great teacher, master, and philosopher of Sanatan Dharma, presented by Anuradha Paudwal ji. The event also witnessed release of a cross-border music collaboration between India and Bangladesh. Indian playback singer Padmashri Anuradha Paudwal and Bangladeshi music composer Asif Ali launched their album with great fanfare. [ANI](/ani-stories)| London | Updated: 01-06-2024 15:19 IST | Created: 01-06-2024 15:19 IST - Country: - United Kingdom PNN London [UK]/ Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], June 1: A multicultural evening was celebrated in the House of Commons at the British Parliament, United Kingdom with the release of "The Works of Adi Shankaracharya", a music series of the scriptures by the great teacher, master, and philosopher of Sanatan Dharma, presented by Anuradha Paudwal ji. The event also witnessed release of a cross-border music collaboration between India and Bangladesh. Indian playback singer Padmashri Anuradha Paudwal and Bangladeshi music composer Asif Ali launched their album with great fanfare. Becomes the first Indian to present the teachings of "Shri ADI SHANKARACHARYA" at the House of Commons at the British Parliament, United Kingdom Anuradha Ji's mission is to familiarize the world with Sanatan Dharma, a mother philosophy that encompasses various religious doctrines and teaches humans to live in harmony with themselves and the world around them. It is a universal philosophy that binds a diverse society together. The evening spearheaded a movement where people from diverse backgrounds and faiths were united by love and respect for their origins, a thought endorsed by Sanatan philosophy. The initiative was attended and greatly appreciated by the host and MP of the British Parliament - Ms Seema Malhotra, Lord Tariq Ahmad of Wimbledon - Minister of State for Middle East, North Africa, South Asia, United Nations and the Commonwealth, Prime Minister's Special Representative for Preventing Sexual Violence in Conflict, Shri Gopi Hinduja, Head of the Hinduja Group and many esteemed members of the audience. Padmashri Dr Anuradha Paudwal unveiled her music series Works of Adi Shankaracharya, teachings of a much revered philosopher and teacher of Sanatan who single handedly strived to reintroduce a purist Vedic way of life for commoners and kings alike. Bharat's great knowledge, was endangered by invaders and foreign ideas and common man was consumed by confusion and misleading knowledge about how to achieve their goals. Adi Shankaracharya taught pure Vedic wisdom that allows to achieve material and spiritual success. He was a traditionalist who did not dilute or misinterpret systems but was proud of his origin as a Devta Upasaka. On this development, Anuradha ji said, "Sanatan Dharma, is often misinterpreted. In reality, it encompasses a timeless and universal philosophy that promotes individual strength, harmony and an inclusive ecosystem. Its teachings emphasize the importance of inner peace, spiritual growth and the interconnectedness of all beings. By promoting these values, it seeks to create a world where diverse cultures can unite under a common platform of mutual respect and understanding. I am committed to taking this message of peace and unity to audiences around the world". Paudwal's illustrious career spans over 50 years, during which she has received numerous accolades for her contributions to Indian music and spirituality. She has sung more than 10000 songs in over 15 languages and released 1,500 bhajan albums till date. Her efforts to promote Sanatan Dharma are a natural extension of her lifelong dedication to uplifting and inspiring others through her art. She continues to be a beacon of cultural and spiritual enlightenment, advocating for a world where ancient wisdom and modern living coexist in harmony. She is also dedicated to promoting the teachings of Sanatan Dharma, striving to bring the world closer through the universal principles of peace, harmony, and spiritual growth. (ADVERTORIAL DISCLAIMER: The above press release has been provided by PNN. ANI will not be responsible in any way for the content of the same) (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) ALSO READ [US arrests American and Ukrainian in North Korea-linked IT infiltration scheme](/article/law-order/2941426-us-arrests-american-and-ukrainian-in-north-korea-linked-it-infiltration-scheme) [German minister: Ukraine needs long-range weapons to defend Kharkiv](/article/politics/2941760-german-minister-ukraine-needs-long-range-weapons-to-defend-kharkiv) [IAEA continues mission to safeguard Ukraine‚Äôs Zaporizhzhya NPP](/article/technology/2941706-iaea-continues-mission-to-safeguard-ukraines-zaporizhzhya-npp) [Russian forces expanded area of active combat by almost 70 km, Ukraine's army chief says](/article/law-order/2941812-russian-forces-expanded-area-of-active-combat-by-almost-70-km-ukraines-army-chief-says) [UK is a de facto participant in Ukraine war, says Russian ambassador](/article/law-order/2941945-uk-is-a-de-facto-participant-in-ukraine-war-says-russian-ambassador)

author: Dpa
title: Rettungshubschrauber-Einsatz: Nach Motorradungl√ºck - schwerer Unfall im Stau auf A3
text:
Im langen Stau auf der A3 nach einem t√∂dlichen Motorradunfall n√∂rdlich von Frankfurt ist ein Mann schwer verletzt worden. Der Mann war am Stauende auf einen Lkw aufgefahren, wie die Polizei mitteilte. Er wurde in seinem Kleintransporter eingeklemmt und musste von der Feuerwehr daraus befreit werden.
Der 45-J√§hrige sei schwer verletzt worden, hei√üt es, er sei mit einem Rettungshubschrauber in eine Klinik gebracht worden. Sein Fahrzeug wurde laut Polizei v√∂llig zerst√∂rt, auch der Lkw-Auflieger wurde besch√§digt. Ein Schaden von rund 30.000 Euro entstand.
Ein t√∂dlicher Motorradunfall hatte f√ºr den kilometerlangen Stau n√∂rdlich von Frankfurt gesorgt. Die Autobahn 3 war zwischen Bad Camberg und Idstein im Landkreis Limburg-Weilburg voll gesperrt worden. Aufr√§um- und Reinigungsarbeiten dauerten der Mitteilung zufolge l√§nger an.

text: Thermal Power Plant Market Growth Opportunities in the Regions: 2024-2031 Forecast of Manufacturers, Types, and Application | EDF, American Electric Power Company The Thermal Power Plant Market pertains to the global industry involved in generating electricity through the combustion of fossil fuels such as coal, natural gas, and oil, or through nuclear reactions to produce steam that drives turbines connected to generators. From 2024 to 2031, this market is expected to evolve with factors such as energy demand growth, technological advancements in plant efficiency, and regulatory trends favoring cleaner energy sources. Key drivers include investments in modernizing aging infrastructure, transitioning towards low-carbon technologies, and regional energy security considerations. The forecasted period highlights opportunities for market expansion driven by global electricity demand, adoption of advanced turbine technologies, and integration of renewable energy sources like solar and wind to support a balanced energy mix globally.
